abilities.description: You gain a specialist. The specialist is part of your crew, but is tracked as a connection and provides benefits to you and your allies per their role. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3782f1b3c8ca8b88]{Withstand Damage} and score a miss, or if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}, you may suffer the cost by noting the specialist as out of action. An out of action specialist provides no benefit. To restore a specialist to duty, resolve the situation as appropriate to the nature of the injury, trauma, or dispute.
Gain additional specialists by spending 1 experience to add a connection to your crew as a specialist. Specialist bonuses may not be stacked for a single action.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by gathering your specialists to strategize or problem-solve, you may reroll one die for each participating specialist.
